reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Smith took the time to go over my genetic history and potential risk factors.  She was wonderful and highly recommend her.
Extremely thorough in approach and very responsive.  Answered all questions very well.
She is thoughtful, kind and caring. She knows what she is doing.
Dr Smith is well versed in her specialty and a caring, concerned doctor. I look forward to further care from her!
Dr. Julia Smith is very caring, professional and makes you feel at ease.  She listens and is thorough about explaining what steps will be taking to help you.

Wonderful visit. She took all the time I needed. 
Would certainly recommend her.
It was not at the level of my expectations

reviewDetails.comment: She is a wonderful doctor; the office is run extremely well
Dr. Basile is very thorough and her office staff very helpful.  She's hard to get an appointment with so book early but she's very detailed and communicates well.
Very efficient, very through and very informative. Dr. Basile does a great job explaining things and staying on top of the issue. Great staff and an efficient office.
Very pleasant and knowledgeable.
A Very helpful and caring Doctor
She was fantastic.
I’ve seen Dr. Basile for many years she’s very professional. Only negative is that wait times are long

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Petelin is an excellent doctor and always has great beside manner and makes my trips to the doctor seamless. I am someone super afraid of needles and getting blood drawn and my experience at his office has been nothing short of amazing as I’m able to get all my blood work done and tests feeling like it’s easy and that Dr. Petelin cares about my overall health and well-being. I’d recommend Dr Petelin to anyone looking for a doctor who cares especially if you’re apart of the LGBTQ community like I am it’s hard to find great doctors who also ensure you’re taking care of your sexual health by regular std tests without judgement.
Dr Petelin is amazing. By far the best primarily care doctor I’ve had. Great bedside manner and knowledgeable.

He was very sweet and attentive!
Dr. Fallis answered all of my questions/concerns.
Staff is very friendly and accommodating. Even we were late for the appointment the staff was cordial to accommodate us. I would consider this clinic for future.
Excellent care

reviewDetails.comment: I HAVE recommended Dr. Blechman to friends and family and they have seen him. He is really terrific and I pass his name on whenever possible.
Dr Bleechman was caring and concerned, friendly while maintaining professional and efficient standards of service. I was so very thankful for the excellent care I received at his office.
I  met with him briefly but I had a good visit.
Good Doctor
I will recommend him to family and friends. He took the time to explain what needs to be done and did not rush through explaining anything.

Dr. Blackman was both very professional and friendly. He answered every question I had and gave detailed explanations. He even showed a diagram to help with his explanation. He went over my medical history thoroughly which I also appreciated and asked questions when he felt it necessary.

Dr. Blechman  is a professional doctor. I recommend his professional diagnosis and treatment. His team for the colonoscopy screening were treated me with respect prior to treatment. Post treatment. I was treated respectfully, monitored for proper recovery. 
Explanation of procedure and results were clearly communicated.
The test results were promptly communicated, and emails exchanges were replied within the guidelines. 
Referral surgeon for appendix removal was great as well.                    Dr. Nipa Ghandi.
Surgery was a success too.
Dr. Blechman was very friendly, clear and concise, all things I much appreciate.

Dr. Blechman is a wonderful doctor, I have been with his practice for over 10 years. He is patient, kind and offers great advice and suggestions, and offers a combination of prescription medicines and supplements for GI issues. I highly recommend him.

reviewDetails.comment: Efficient, considerate and knowledgeable

This doctor refused to modify the supply of my prescription to make it qualify for insurance coverage without an office visit. Then when I went to the office she sent me away without providing me with any medical assistance/advise, since none was needed. It is unethical as a medical profession to hold a patient’s prescription as hostage so they can charge for another useless office visit.
Dr. Rice is as brilliant as she is kind. One of the best doctors I’ve seen and bet Manhattan has to offer.
Dr. Rice is a great practitioner. Efficient, kind, polite, and knowledgeable
Waited more than an hour just to be seen by her and  then it took another hour before I was able to leave. This was the most painfully long doctors visit I’ve ever had.
Dr. Rice is the best. So friendly and really listens to your needs.
Dra. Laurie Rice is a very nice, good listener, patient doctor.  She responds to any email and/or call from me.

reviewDetails.comment: Very professional

The doctor had me wait for an hour past the scheduled time, spent 5 minutes with me, and charged for $325 for the "visit". I was told that my insurance would cover the cost, which was apparently not the case. I was informed by Cigna that there are multiple pricing ranges for a new patient visit and clearly they billed the highest possible choice, and didn't communicate anything about the pricing. Definitely wouldn't recommend to anyone, very unprofessional and randomly priced.
Dr Fenton takes the time to see me as a person, and not just a patient.  He is warm and caring and I have complete confidence that he knows what he's doing.
Dr. Fenton was congenial, efficient, explained the procedure and did not try and up-sell me on additional services.

Dr Fenton is excellent Dermotologist and has helped me with my painful psoriasis. I’ve been a patient for almost a year.  He is a smart and compassionate doctor. He doesn’t give up.   You can’t ask for more than that!!  The best!
Love him! Always super helpful and informative. Always takes time to address concerns.
He was able to help me with poison ivy.
Seems to know his stuff

I have never been asked for additional payment for an eye prescription! 
It was a waste of time and money !
Excellent doctor and staff, would highly recommend.
Competent. Friendly. Cooperative. Caring. And that’s on a Friday afternoon of a three-day weekend!
I have been going to Dr. Calenda for years. He may seem a little awkward to some but he is a good Ophthalmologist.
He is caring, concerned and professional
